plugin.name: settings
plugin.author: Paul Fernley
plugin.title: Application settings (global constants) plugin
plugin.description: Allows for the creation, maintenance and use of system-wide application settings (global constants) stored in a database. The values of the various settings can be of type String, Intger, BigDecimal or Date. The usual List, Show, Edit and Create views are included and, after installing the plugin, will be available at a URL such as http://myServer/myApp/setting/list etc. These views assume you are using a layout called 'main'.
